U-Turn nach Irrtum endet mit vier Verletzten
Ein U-Turn auf der Sundgauerstrasse endete am Sonntag mit vier Verletzten, darunter ein Kleinkind. Der Lenker übersah ein hinter ihm fahrendes Auto.
03 Nov 2019, 16:43 by lha





Bei einer Kollision auf der Sundgauerstrasse in Reinach wurden am Sonntagnachmittag, 3. November, vier Personen verletzt.





Der unfallversursachende Lenker kam nach den Erkenntnissen der Baselbieter Polizei von der Autobahn A18 kommend und bog auf der Ausfahrt nach rechts in Richtung Reinach ab.





Beim anschliessenden Wendemanöver auf dem zweispurigen Bereich übersah er ein nach ihm fahrendes Auto auf der linken Fahrbahn.





Vier Personen, darunter ein Kleinkind, wurden beim Unfall verletzt. Alle wurden durch die Sanität ins Spital gebracht.





Die Unfallfahrzeuge mussten abgeschleppt werden. Bei der Unfallaufnahme stand auch die Feuerwehr im Einsatz.

text:
U-turn to error ends with four casualties
A U-turn on the Sundgauerstrasse ended on Sunday with four injured, including a toddler. The driver overlooked a car driving behind him.
03 Nov 2019, 16:43 by lha





In a collision on the Sundgauerstrasse in Reinach on Sunday afternoon, November 3, four people were injured.





According to the findings of the Basel-based police, the driver who caused the accident came from the A18 motorway and turned right at the exit in the direction of Reinach.





During the subsequent turning maneuver on the two-lane section, he overlooked a car driving towards him on the left lane.





Four people, including a toddler, were injured in the accident. All were taken to the hospital by the paramedics.





The accident vehicles had to be towed. In the accident recording was also the fire department in action.


In a collision on the Sundgauerstrasse in Reinach four people were injured on Sunday afternoon. According to the findings of the Basel-based police, the accident-causing driver came from the A18 motorway and turned right at the exit towards Reinach. Then the 27-year-old noticed that he should have turned to the left.
During the subsequent turning maneuver on the two-lane section, he overlooked a car driving behind him on the left-hand lane. As a result, there was a side-frontal collision.
Four people, including a toddler, were injured in the accident. All were taken to the hospital by the paramedics. The accident vehicles had to be towed. In the accident recording was also the fire department in action.
